review: I should have spent more time reading the reviews and the specs on this. I have a lot of movies on my computer and was looking for this to stream them to my TV but it doesn't do that. review: I've got a few of these. Good to have if your tv is not a "smart" one. Hopefully they add more apps for these, I use them mostly for streaming Netflix and it works very well indeed in that capacity. The streaming from a pc browser is average and not very smooth or impressive.I use the Avia app on my android phone to stream pics and that works well. Setting them up is usually easy but I did run into one that failed to connect and had to return for replacement. They're ok for the price and beats adding boxes everywhere.
author: RC

review: Whatever you do, DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF GARBAGE. Quite simply, it does not work. It will NEVER hold a connection to wifi and you will never stream more than 30 seconds of anything before this pile of crap fails out. And that's only IF you can ever get it to find show up in your network in the first place. 99.9999999% of the time you will never find this thing on your wifi network because it simply DOES NOT WORK. If and when you finally manage to connect it after hours of cursing and wondering why google released such a faulty piece of trash to the public market, presumably knowing full well that it doesn't function, don't blink....because in a split second....it's gone and needs set up/connected again. A virtually impossible task. BUYER BEWARE is the understatement of the year.
